price: Idhuj, që nuk mund t’u japin ndonjë ndihmë atyre e as veten nuk mund ta ndihmojnë?!
arabic: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرٗا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walā yastaṭīʿūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūna
